attributes.action: Passengers in a car with a drunk driver should also be fined/banned
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The majority of people who enter a car where the driver is over the legal alcohol driving limit are fully aware of the fact that the driver is breaking the law.  They normally will have been drinking with each other and all passangers are fully aware of how much the driver has had to drink therefore they are equally as bad.  Therefore the passangers of the car should also be punnished.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
